trans-unit.source: The exception thrown when the internal buffer overflows.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod et når den interne bufferen går ut over unntaket.

trans-unit.source: In a <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>, when you are notified of file changes, the system stores those changes in a buffer the component creates and passes to the Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: I en <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>Når du blir varslet om filendringer, system-lagre endringene i en buffer komponenten oppretter og sender til Application Programming Interface (API-er).</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher>

trans-unit.source: If there are many changes in a short time, the buffer can easily overflow, resulting in an exception being thrown, which essentially loses all changes.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det er mange endringer i en liten stund, kan bufferen enkelt overflyt, noe som førte til en som det oppstod et unntak, som i hovedsak mister alle endringer.

trans-unit.source: To keep the buffer from overflowing, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to filter out your unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: For å hindre at bufferen overflyt, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for å filtrere bort din uønsket varslinger.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also increase the size of the internal buffer through the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også øke størrelsen på den interne bufferen via den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: Økning av størrelsen på bufferen er kostbar imidlertid, så lag bufferen som små som mulig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny standardforekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: These constructors are used by the component to signify an error.
trans-unit.target: Disse konstruktører brukes av komponenten til å angi en feil.

trans-unit.source: Only use them if extending the class or the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Bare bruk dem hvis utvider klassen eller .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates an internal buffer has overflowed and users should take appropriate steps in their code to ensure it recovers properly.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket angir oppstod en intern buffer og brukere skal ta fremgangsmåten i koden til å sikre gjenoppretter riktig.

trans-unit.source: The cause of the overflow is often too many changes in a short period of time, causing the internal notification buffer to overflow.
trans-unit.target: Årsaken til overflyt er ofte for mange endringer i en kort periode, fører til at den interne varsling bufferen til å overskride.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil løse dette problemet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for å filtrere ut uønsket endringsforespørsler.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also increase the size of the internal buffer through the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også øke størrelsen på den interne bufferen via den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: Økning av størrelsen på bufferen er kostbar imidlertid, så lag bufferen som små som mulig.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"></xref> class with the error message to be displayed specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"> </xref> angitt for klassen med feilmeldingen som skal vises.

trans-unit.source: These constructors are used by the component to signify an error.
trans-unit.target: Disse konstruktører brukes av komponenten til å angi en feil.

trans-unit.source: Only use them if extending the class or the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Bare bruk dem hvis utvider klassen eller .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates an internal buffer has overflowed and users should take appropriate steps in their code to ensure it recovers properly.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket angir oppstod en intern buffer og brukere skal ta fremgangsmåten i koden til å sikre gjenoppretter riktig.

trans-unit.source: The cause of the overflow is often too many changes in a short period of time, causing the internal notification buffer to overflow.
trans-unit.target: Årsaken til overflyt er ofte for mange endringer i en kort periode, fører til at den interne varsling bufferen til å overskride.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil løse dette problemet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for å filtrere ut uønsket endringsforespørsler.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also increase the size of the internal buffer through the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også øke størrelsen på den interne bufferen via den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: Økning av størrelsen på bufferen er kostbar imidlertid, så lag bufferen som små som mulig.

trans-unit.source: The message to be given for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal angis for unntaket.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new, empty instance of the <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"></xref> class that is serializable using the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny, tom forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"> </xref> klasse som kan serialiseres parametersettet med de angitte <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> og <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>objekter.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: The information required to serialize the T:System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException object.
trans-unit.target: Informasjonen som kreves for å serialisere T:System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException-objekt.

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream associated with the T:System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException object.
trans-unit.target: Kilde og mål for serialisert dataflyt knyttet til T:System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException-objektet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"></xref> class with the message to be displayed and the generated inner exception specified.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IO.InternalBufferOverflowException"> </xref> klassen med meldingen som skal vises og genererte internt unntak som er angitt.

trans-unit.source: These constructors are used by the component to signify an error.
trans-unit.target: Disse konstruktører brukes av komponenten til å angi en feil.

trans-unit.source: Only use them if extending the class or the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: Bare bruk dem hvis utvider klassen eller .NET Framework.

trans-unit.source: This exception indicates an internal buffer has overflowed and users should take appropriate steps in their code to ensure it recovers properly.
trans-unit.target: Dette unntaket angir oppstod en intern buffer og brukere skal ta fremgangsmåten i koden til å sikre gjenoppretter riktig.

trans-unit.source: The cause of the overflow is often too many changes in a short period of time, causing the internal notification buffer to overflow.
trans-unit.target: Årsaken til overflyt er ofte for mange endringer i en kort periode, fører til at den interne varsling bufferen til å overskride.

trans-unit.source: To resolve this, use the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties to filter out unwanted change notifications.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil løse dette problemet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper for å filtrere ut uønsket endringsforespørsler.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.IncludeSubdirectories%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.NotifyFilter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also increase the size of the internal buffer through the <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan også øke størrelsen på den interne bufferen via den <xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen.</xref:System.IO.FileSystemWatcher.InternalBufferSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: However, increasing the size of the buffer is expensive, so keep the buffer as small as possible.
trans-unit.target: Økning av størrelsen på bufferen er kostbar imidlertid, så lag bufferen som små som mulig.

trans-unit.source: The message to be given for the exception.
trans-unit.target: Meldingen som skal angis for unntaket.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket.
